Body:
n = NewOrderCommand(121234, 1234235.123, 2342, 'user_x', MARKET, BID_SIDE,
    FAR, Price('34.52'), 1000)
oec = OrderEventChain(n, LOGGER, MonotonicIntID())
ack = AcknowledgementReport(121235, 1234235.123, 2342, 'user_x', MARKET, n,
    Price('34.52'), 1000, 1000)
oec.apply_acknowledgement_report(ack)
aggressor = NewOrderCommand(1111, 1234237.123, 22222, 'user_x', MARKET,
    ASK_SIDE, FAR, Price('34.52'), 44)
pf = PartialFillReport(121236, 1234237.123, 2342, 'user_x', MARKET,
    aggressor, 44, Price('34.52'), BID_SIDE, 99999, 1000 - 44)
oec.apply_partial_fill_report(pf)
assert oec.open_exposure_requests() == []
assert oec.current_exposure().price() == Price('34.52')
assert oec.current_exposure().qty() == 1000 - 44
assert oec.visible_qty() == 1000 - 44
assert oec.iceberg_peak_qty() == 1000
assert oec.has_partial_fill()
